data.name: بارنگ نمایان محتوا
data.description: Barang active within the fields of Information Technology and Telecommunication. Barang is one of the subsidiary companies of Dayan Holding which have some of the most successful IT and ICT brands in Iran in the fields of: mobile service providing, mobile entertainment, interactive games, mobile applications and mobile streaming, M-Commerce, Venture Capital and Game Publishing platforms. Barang mainly focused on online education services, digital content providing and mobile service providing.
